name: Micropets Shooters
description:
MICROPETS is an arcade game with a combination of run & gun plus tower defense mechanics wherein the goal of the player is to go to the organs and protect them from the virus and save as much as human lives as possible.

In this world where viruses threatens humanity and medicines are not enough to kill the viruses, we have to take the fight within. Run and Gun with the MICROPETS and shoot your way to the reproductive organs to defend them different viruses. Collect different weapons, power ups and special abilities and make your MICROPETS powerful. Grab coins to complete your MICROPETS collection.

STORY:
Scientist found a cure in any virus. This cure is to cultivate a MICROPETS and attached some weapons to literally eliminate virus inside the body. Save number of people and eliminate the viruses that threatens humanity.
